title: He Wants To Be Seen But Not Heard
itunes:title: He Wants To Be Seen But Not Heard
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I are 34 and we’ve been together for 9 years and married for 3 years. The only reason we are married is because I gave him an ultimatum. After six years of dating, we needed to move this thing forward or I was gone. He’s always been very full of himself and the women in his family made him think he was God’s gift to the earth because he has eyes that change color and he’s tall and very handsome..............................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I are 34 and we’ve been together for 9 years and married for 3 years. The only reason we are married is because I gave him an ultimatum. After six years of dating, we needed to move this thing forward or I was gone. He’s always been very full of himself and the women in his family made him think he was God’s gift to the earth because he has eyes that change color and he’s tall and very handsome..............................
